page.title: 13ANSTY SAWMILL NEAR WARDOUR
page.content:
There has been a{sawmill}at{Ansty for{32 years}which has always belonged to the{Ridley}family.The main wood they use is{pine,fir,oak}and{spruce. They get this from roughly a{50 mile radius although they do get a little foreign wood which is{Russian Spruce. To cut the wood they have{3 main saws. They mostly get orders for{fencing {posts. In the sawmill yard, lies a{20 ton tree trunk! It is the biggest {Mr.Ridley}has had so far. In diameter, it is{2.1metres,}and its circumference is{20feet or 6 metres.}The huge{Cedar {of Lebanon}cost{Â£500,}and they hope to sell its wood for{Â£2000.}By counting the rings on its face, you can tell it is{167 years old.
Catherine Lane & Bridget Montgomery
